description: Number of symmetric anti-Hadamard matrices of order n.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: R. L. Graham and N. J. A. Sloane, Anti-Hadamard matrices, Linear Alg. Applic., 62 (1984), 113-137, Table 1.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
